lead_paragraph: It took three seasons and seven tries for Xavier to finally get the one victory that had eluded it. And maybe tip the balance of power in the Big East, too.

headline.print_headline: Macura, Sumner Lead No. 5 Xavier Over No. 1 Villanova 90-83
headline.main: Macura, Sumner Lead No. 5 Xavier Over No. 1 Villanova 90-83

snippet: It took three seasons and seven tries for Xavier to finally get the one victory that had eluded it. And maybe tip the balance of power in the Big East, too....
